alert.note: Alert for Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Utah Valley; Wasatch Back (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 21 at 2:36PM MST until December 22 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM MST THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 11 AM MST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 20 below zero for the Wasatch Back, 10 below zero for Weber and Davis County, near 0 Salt Lake and Utah County. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 1 to 4 inches, locally up to 7 inches Wasatch Back. * WHERE...Northern Wasatch Front, Salt Lake Valley, Utah Valley and Wasatch Back. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 8 PM this evening to 11 AM MST Thursday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 1 AM MST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions are expected. The hazardous conditions will impact the Wednesday evening commute. The cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...An unusual combination of elevated winds and very cold temperatures will bring near to below 0 wind chills to the Wasatch Front.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit weather.gov/slc/winter. For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of Transportation, visit http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial 511.

area.areaDesc: Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley; Utah Valley; Wasatch Back
